column4: BRIEF-Kraton Corp Announces Pricing Of Private Offering Of Senior Notes

column4: BRIEF-Kraton Corp Announces Private Offering Of Senior Notes And Additional Term Loan Borrowings
column6: * ORATION ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PRIVATE OFFERING OF SENIOR NOTES AND ADDITIONAL TERM LOAN BORROWINGS AS PART OF A REFINANCING OF CERTAIN OUTSTANDING INDEBTEDNESS
column7: * UNITS INTEND TO OFFER EUR 290.0 MILLION IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026
column8: * ALSO ANNOUNCED ITS INTENTION FOR KRATON LLC TO BORROW AN ADDITIONAL $90.0 MILLION IN INCREMENTAL U.S. DOLLAR DENOMINATED TERM LOANS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

column7: * KRATON CORP - CONTINUE TO EXPECT FULL-YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE APPROXIMATELY $400 MILLION
